code: var averageValue=function averageValue(min,max){return Math.round((min+max)/2);};var parsToTemperature=function parsToTemperature(data){var result=data.list.map(function(item){return{name:item.dt_txt,temperature:averageValue(item.main.temp_min,item.main.temp_max)};});return result;};var parsToWind=function parsToWind(data){var result=data.list.map(function(item){return{name:item.dt_txt,windSpeed:item.wind.speed};});return result;};var parsToWeather=function parsToWeather(data){var result=data.list.map(function(item){return{name:item.dt_txt,weather:item.weather[0].description,icon:item.weather[0].icon};});return result;};export{parsToTemperature,parsToWind,parsToWeather};
